message.value: To configure a chat configuration
To create a new chat configuration
Cannot create a new chat configuration, the name is missing
The chat configuration %s already exists
The chat configuration %s has been created
To rename the current chat configuration
Cannot rename configuration %s, the name is missing
Cannot rename configuration %s as %s, this configuration already exists
The chat configuration %s has been renamed as %s
To save the current chat configuration
The chat configuration %s has been saved
To display the name of registered chat configurations
There is any registered chat configuration
There is one registered chat configuration :%n%s
List of registered chat configurations :%n%s
To delete the file of a chat configuration
Cannot delete the file of a chat configuration, the name is missing
The deletion of the %s configuration file was not successful
The %s chat configuration file has been deleted
To display the current chat configuration characteristics
Characteristics of the current chat configuration :%n%s
To load a chat configuration
Cannot load a chat configuration, the name is missing
The chat configuration %s has been loaded
To add a chat to this configuration or a player to a chat
To add a chat to this configuration
Cannot add a chat to configuration %s, the name is missing
Cannot add chat "%s" to configuration %s, the color is missing
Cannot add chat "%s" to configuration %s, "%s" is not a color
Cannot add chat %s to configuration %s, this name is forbidden for a chat
Cannot add chat %s to configuration %s, this chat already exists
Cannot add chat %s to configuration %s, the color %s is already used by chat %s
Chat %s has been added to configuration %s
Cannot add players to a chat, the chat's name is missing
Cannot add players to chat "%s", it does not exist in configuration %s
Cannot add player %s to chat %s, this player is already registered in this chat
Any player has been added
The player %s has been added to chat %s
Players %s have been added to chat %s
To set wether the chat configuration is synchronized with the game configuration to run
Cannot set if the chat configuration is synchronized, the value is missing
The chat configuration %s is synchronized
The chat configuration %s is not synchronized
To remove a chat from the configuration or a player from a chat
To remove a chat from a chat configuration
All chats from configuration %s have been removed : %s
Cannot remove chat "%s" from configuration %s, this chat does not exist
Any chat has been removed from configuration %s
Le chat %s a été supprimé de la configuration %s
Chats %s have been removed from configuration %s
To remove players from a chat
All players have been removed from their chats
Cannot remove player "%s" from a chat, he is not registered for configuration %s
Any player has been removed
Player %s has been removed from chat %s
Players %s have been removed from chats %s
There is no chat configuration defined to use this command
You cannot send a message to chat %s, this chat does not exist for configuration %s
You are not registered in %s
To modify the name or the color of a chat
To modify the name of a chat
Cannot rename a chat, chat's name to rename is missing
Cannot rename chat %s, the new chat's name is missing
Cannot rename chat "%s", this chat does not exists in configuration %s
Cannot rename chat %s as %s, this name is forbidden for a chat
Cannot rename chat %s as %s, this name is already used
The chat %s has been renamed as %s
To modify the color of a chat
Cannot modify chat's color, the chat's name is missing
Cannot modify the color of chat %s, the new color's name is missing
Cannot modify the color of chat %s, it does not exist for configuration %s
Cannot modify the color of chat %s, the color "%s" does not exist
Cannot modify the color of chat %s, the color %s is already used by chat %s
The color of chat %s has been updated for configuration %s
